title: Well Met Indeed (4R106)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	5
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Spot an Elf, a [Gondor] Man, and a Dwarf to play Gandalf from your dead pile.
Lore:	”'And what may you be doing in these parts? An Elf, a Man, and a Dwarf, all clad in elvish fashion.'”
Rarity:	R
